rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with Vastu principles ensuring the entrance faces the east or north.
Open concept living and dining area with plenty of natural light oriented towards the south-west as per Vastu to encourage positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living area with ample space for family gatherings, designed following Vastu guidelines by placing it in the north-west sector.
Modern kitchen with efficient workflow and ventilation; oriented towards the south-east according to Vastu for positive energy flow in cooking area.
A private guest bedroom ensuring a quiet space; placed with an east-facing window as per Vastu for enhanced well-being.
Compact space adjoining the master bedroom; designed to store clothing and accessories, following Vastu principles for organization.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony facing east or north as per Vastu guidelines to promote health and prosperity.

openings.description: Main entrance door, aligned with the east or north side of the property as per Vastu recommendations to ensure a positive energy flow.
Large window for natural light and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines.
Proper kitchen ventilation as per Vastu principles.
